bug.author: sandy9999
bug.summary: EOF error while running calc_weight.py of SegNet
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17477947/50586727-da356780-0ea0-11e9-8219-05b45856cd82.png></denchmark-link>
This is what I am getting when I run python calc_weight.py, an EOF error, what could be the reason? I have installed the modules and dependencies as mentioned in the README. As a result, class_weight.npy is not getting created and I am not able to train.

comments.comment: The latest release is not compatible with the master branch. If you are using the module downloaded by pip, please use the scripts released in the latest release. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/releases/tag/v0.11.0>https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/releases/tag/v0.11.0</denchmark-link>
temporarily closed. If you still have same issue, please reopen.
